error.name: 0x0A
error.description: 0x0A is thrown if either: The required Python modules are not present or Python is not installed. Required Python modules: Pygame PgZero
error.fix: Install the python modules listed above using the command 'pip install pygame, pgzero'. or Install Python from the Microsoft Store at the following URL: https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.11.0/python-3.11.0-amd64.exe
